Feb 24 (Reuters) - Anglo American PLC AAL.L:

  • ANGLO AMERICAN PLC - ANGLO AMERICAN FINANCIAL RESULTS 2021

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - $2.1 BILLION PROPOSED FINAL DIVIDEND, EQUAL TO $1.18 PER SHARE FINAL DIVIDEND

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - EXIT FROM THERMAL COAL OPERATIONS COMPLETED

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - FY PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO EQUITY SHAREHOLDERS OF $8.6 BILLION

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - EXPECTATIONS FOR RETAIL RESTOCKING IN EARLY 2022 ARE ENCOURAGING FOLLOWING STRONG RETAIL SALES OF DIAMOND JEWELLERY OVER HOLIDAY SEASON

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - DIAMOND PRODUCTION GUIDANCE FOR 2022 IS 30-33 MILLION CARATS (100% BASIS)

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - COPPER CHILE PRODUCTION GUIDANCE FOR CHILE FOR 2022 IS 560,000-600,000 TONNES

  • ANGLO AMERICAN - PGM METAL IN CONCENTRATE PRODUCTION GUIDANCE FOR 2022 IS 4.1-4.5 MILLION OUNCES,

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAL.L
